About

Driven by the intersection of creativity and logic, I love transforming simple ideas into intuitive and engaging web applications that solve everyday problems. Through thoughtful design, efficient code, and seamless user interactions, I create interfaces where intelligent systems meet human intuition. With interests spanning from data visualization to AI-powered enhancements, my goal is to build technology that empowers people to reach their full potential.

Gravida Beauty

Gravida Beauty is a platform designed to help expecting mothers gather information about pregnancy-safe skincare. It features a tool for checking whether or not ingredients in products are pregnancy-safe as well as provides a space for users to discuss related topics.

React | Firebase
